Defines the WiiBoard button events.

Author:
Santiago Hors Fraile

Field Detail

isPressed

public boolean isPressed
True if the button is currently pushed down.

isReleased

public boolean isReleased
Determines if the button is released after being pressed down. Note: If the button is in the pressed down state when the board is connecting, the first button event that is expected to report a release might not. True if the button was pressed down and now is not pressed down
